verbs.description: " [ARG0: AT&T] [V: hiring] [ARG1: Michael Cohen] [ARG2: as a political consultant] was a big mistake , " the company 's CEO Randall Stephenson said Friday morning . AT&T paid Cohen , President Trump 's personal lawyer and fixer , $ 600,000 through a contract that ended in December 2017 .
